newsitem.title: BELGIUM: EU protests at China dissident's sentence.
newsitem.headline: EU protests at China dissident's sentence.

text.p: The European Union on Tuesday expressed "profound concern" at a 11-year jail sentence passed on Chinese dissident Wang Dan by a Chinese court last week.

"The European Union deplores this punitive and repressive sentence which raises justifiable concern about China's commitment to the rule of law," a statement from the current Irish presidency of the 15-nation bloc said.
A Beijing court last week took less than four hours to convict Wang, 27, for plotting against the government. His imprisonment sparked concern and outrage from around the world.
The Irish statement said Wang's activities "in a democratic society would be considered as the exercise by him of intrinsic and inalienable right to freedom of expression".
